mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_tb (chat_id,chatting_content, chatted_at, user_nickname, moim_id) VALUES (default ,#{chattingContent}, NOW(), #{userNickName}, #{moimId})
mapper.update: update chat_tb set deleted_at = now(), deleted = 1 where chat_id = #{chatId}
mapper.select: select chat_id as chatId, chatting_content as chattingContent, chatted_at as chattedAt, user_nickname as userNickName, moim_id as moimId, deleted as deleted, deleted_at as deletedAt from chat_tb where moim_id = #{moimId} order by chatted_at DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}
